CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 11, 1961, page A14, reads: "Working on Dance - The above group got together to discuss the pre-holiday dance of Loendi Club, Nov. 22, at the Hotel Hilton. Seated, left to right are: Mrs. Dorothy Page, ticket chairman, Loendi Auxiliary; Miss Patricia Prattis and Miss Wyetta Turner, representing the young set, and Mrs. Marie Clay, ticket chairman, Career Women of Loendi. Standing are: John Burton, general chairman of the dance, and Harry Richardson, one of his co-chairmen. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of two men standing, left to right: John Burton, and Harry Richardson, and four women seated, left to right: Dorothy Page, Patricia Prattis, Wyetta Turner, and Marie Clay, posed around two armchairs in interior of the Hilton Hotel with light colored curtains
